abstract: Defense lawyers for accused Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, during penalty phase of trial, show jury longer version of video showing him thrusting his middle finger at security camera in his prison cell three months after bombing; move is effort to put gesture in a context that makes it seem less confrontational.
lead_paragraph: The defense showed the jury a fuller portion of a video showing Dzhokhar Tsarnaev thrusting his middle finger at a security camera three months after the bombing.

headline.main: After Jury Sees Gesture by Boston Marathon Bomber, Defense Tries to Blunt Its Meaning
headline.print_headline: After Jury Sees Gesture by Marathon Bomber, Defense Tries to Blunt Its Meaning

snippet: The defense showed the jury a fuller portion of a video showing Dzhokhar Tsarnaev thrusting his middle finger at a security camera three months after the bombing.
